google_play_reviews.content: Great app for those who still love their Pebble. All the features I need and none I don't.
Now it's not working,i can't get caller id,only I get miss call I'd.
I wish there was something to replace my Pebble Time Steel. Alas no one makes anything close to that thing. Thank your rebble.

Used to work, but not anymore. The best I can get is to disable original Pebble. Then I when I see unknown number, I can press dismiss which doesn't dismiss the call, but will show the caller name and number. If I disable phone calls, I get no notification.
Great workaround for the limitation that the official app and lack of update for new android versions brings, definitely a life saver
Caller Id works and answering works sometimes. Unfortunately the mute and dimiss button do not work. I am using this on Android 11.
A this jamie

Was erg blij met de fotootjes van de bellers op mijn arm. Fantastisch. Maar sInds kort werkt de app bij mij niet meer. Bij telefoongesprek komt alleen het woord "Dialer" en een ronddraaiende cirkel in beeld. Gede-installeerd en weer ge√Ønstalleerd helpt me niet. Iemand een oplossing? YES!! After re-installing / installing AND siwtching off notification 'Phone Calls' it worked again. Contact images are shown again. Eric
Stopped working after OS update MIUI global 11.0.2

Stopped working on Samsung 9+ with UI 2.1 on Android 10. It's a shame cause we're few Pebble users that loved to see who's calling us and now we have to buy other "smartwatch" cause of this missing feature we had.
How fix Android watch the right time
Use this fix for broken dismiss call button! Use the app settings to change the Decline Button Text from "Dismiss" to "Decline." First letter capitalized. Decline button will now work.

The app is very nice, but lately it gets stuck on the losing screen on the watch every time I get a call, making me miss a lot of calls. I had to uninstall it because of this. Please fix it if you have the time and resources. If I can help out in any way, please let me know ;)
Great app thanks!

I just came back to Pebble from GWA2. I knew because I now have an android S10e that I would have to load "Dialer for Rebble" to get contacts on incoming calls. That part works fine but I can only answer calls. The red icon at the bottom of the watch screen shows a line thru it so I can't reject a call, the middle icon Green phone works great to answer and the top texting icon is white with a line thru it also so I can't reject and send a text. I have heard other Android 10 users with the same problem. Please help!
The incoming call is displayed on my Pebble Round, but the watch buttons do not work to accept or reject the call. This started when my OnePlus 6T updated to Android 10.
Such a useful app. I I've being able to manage calls right from my Pebble.
Seems to work fine, but what's up with requiring phone microphone access? That isn't listed in the permissions on the FAQ.

This app is dope. My only complaints are that the screen is not lighting up when call occurs and there is no way to light it up in dim places (pressing back button exits the screen) and the icons and styling should follow the pebbles design language.

This seemed to install fine and I disabled the Phone Calls for Pebble app in notifications. I get caller ID and the picture now, BUT the 3 buttons do absolutely nothing when selected. I have to go to the phone to accept, reject or speakerphone...not sure what I'm missing. On a new Pixel 3a with Android 10.
Perfect with photo ID. Oneplus 5T
Shows me who's calling but none of the options shown (answer, reject or speakerphone) actually do anything when you press them. Anyone got any ideas how to fix this?

D√©√ßu d'√™tre oblig√© d'installer cette application depuis Android 9.0, car je n'avais plus l'affichage des noms, mais affichage bien plus agr√©able qu'avant avec notamment la photo du contact qui appel. Par contre les boutons racrocher/micro/haut parleur ne fonctionnent pas. Je ne peux que d√©crocher.
It doesn't show my contacts, it doesn't work
Keeps loosing notification access on my oneplus. Probably my phones fault more than the app though
Thanks for giving new life to my watch!
It WORKS!! Android 9 on Huawei Mate 20. :-) It didn't work until I disabled call notification in the Pebble app (I've missed this in the description). Now my Pebble is fully functional again! :-)
Excellent, solved my "Unknown Caller" problem on Android Pie

Downloaded today after finally having enough of the lost display following upgrade to Android 9. There were some complications with the install, meaning i needed to download the .pbw file from the developer website to update the Pebble. This needed to be sideloaded using CX Explorer, most file managers would not support opening in the Pebble App. I was guided through by the developer, who was incredibly responsive and helpful. Highly recommended!
please fix my watch keeps spinning and will not show me who is calling please fix.
Pebble watch cannot communicate with the app (blocked) on Android Pie (9.0) if Medium power saving is enabled! Please update it, to be able to use in any circumstances! I love it anyway!
like others, caller ID on my pebble broke with pie. this fixed it while also adding contact pictures on incoming calls and some nice other controls and phonebook lookups. Nice work! Thank you!
Great fix for unknown caller issue
still working in my pebble.
I can not get this run on my watch. it just runs time.
Life Saver. Thanks for bringing back this important functionality back to my Pebble.

Turns out after updating to android Pie the default call notification doesn't show caller ID anymore. Dialer for Pebble seems to solve this issue. Much better then the original notifier and I'm glad this still works with updated android.  PS! There are people still using this watch and you should get one and keep this app floating :)
Fantastic - I can now still get the incoming caller on my Pebble using Android 9
call notifications working on my pixel 3. Pebble time steel lives on!
Useful when working and phone in pocket
Pathetic. The way of selecting contact is idiotic. You should be ashamed of having such a stupid system. Make it a normal scrolling list instead of the most idiotic system I've ever tried to use.
Didn't realize how bad the built in call notifications were until this app showed how awesome they could be.  Fixes "unknown caller" issue in native app on Android Pie.
Best developer :)
Works well.
After Android 9 Pie update, my pebble displayed unknown caller for all calls. This app got caller id working again. Thank you.
Awsome

Restored my Pixel 2/Pebble Time Steel from the dreaded 'unknown' caller ID on incoming calls. Can accept a call, mute the microphone, but reject/end call doesn't seem to work.  Using Rebel.io firmware for app store and watchfaces now that Pebble servers are down. LONG LIVE THE PEBBLE!

Fantastic app, that elevates the capabilities of my Pebble. Developer is super re-active and was able to help me very quickly to pinpoint a wrong setting where the dialer would not show on my Pebble upon incoming call. I had my phone in silent mode (as always) but within the Dialer app enabled the setting "Respect phone's do not disturb mode"

Just what I needed! I used to use this app, but deleted it when the standard Pebble software did all that *I* needed. I don't need all the features of this app.  This app is now ESSENTIAL for me as my Android phone is running Android Pie, which has changed the permission structure associated with phone call information. The Pebble will need to be changed to cope with this. Currently a phone call is reported on a Pebble as from "unknown". With this app you not only get the name of the person calling, but also their picture from your contacts displayed on the watch.  If you have Android Pie and a Pebble you need this app.
Best app for pebble, make it very useful
after upgrading to Oreo, SGS7, denial of call does not work. Too bad.

This app extends the capabilities of the phone calls manager of the Pebble. 
It's rich in features, fully customizable and runs flawlessly.

I have to add to the appreciation of everyone else. Thank~You so, SO much for keeping these ever~so precious watches useable! There is absolutely nothing out there that is as affordable & as functional as Pebble schtuffs. It was heart breaking & tummular~heart area sinking when they sold. I know that sounds dramatic, but this watch is like an extension of me =p Please keep doing whatchya do! Much ~ peace~ love~ happiness~ healthiness~ success~ hugs~ &~ kittens~ to ya!~~~
Incredible app! Thanks for all your efforts in keeping this updated. A must have if you have a pebble watch.
Thank you for your continued support.
Thank you!
Great work
It works awesome! Long live Pebble!
It completes the caller ID feature of the watch. It works much stable now with Android 6.0, although it may only shows phone numbers but not the caller name sometimes.
Good App. Thumbs Up  However, I am having issues with toggling speakerphone & mic through the watch.  Any solutions?  Using Mate 8 , running Android 7
Nice app

This worked great on my HTC M9... I was thrilled. I had to upgrade and chose the HUAWEI P10. For some reason the app cannot control the speakerphone and mute... A huge disappointment as used both extensively... Help??
It used to work, I can't dial out anymore on my Samsung s7. üôÅ
Yee
Dez nuts
Great
It used to work great until I upgraded my Samsung S6 to Android Nougat - no notification since then . I can see the on-going call when I open the app on my watch manually though.
problem whit galaxy s6 cant answer from pebble but can call from pebble  i love this app
No notification when I get a call. I have to enter the app to be able to answer calls. I'm using an HTC One M9.
& hence I'm giving it only 3 star :(
My phone can answer but Can't turn on speakerphone. My phone: huawei mate 8
Solved my problem of not being able to answer calls from wrist with pebble...  Now my pebble is complete ;)
Great app
